welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hitachi-Naka, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore our vibrant streets, enjoy the local cuisine, and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: SAZA COFFEE (サザコーヒー 本店)
restaurants.description: SAZA COFFEE (サザコーヒー 本店) is a café located in ひたちなか市.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ibaraki Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ibaraki Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
